poems.title: The Sun's Warm Hug
poems.text:
Golden rays gently touch the earth,
Whispering tales of dawn's rebirth.
In every beam, a warm embrace,
Lighting hearts with gentle grace.

poems.title: Whispers of the Night
poems.text:
Stars twinkle softly, a lullaby,
Moonlight dances across the sky.
Dreams take flight on wings of peace,
Night's calm whispers never cease.

songs.title: Melody of the Heart
songs.text:
Beats that echo deep inside,
Where secrets and feelings reside.
A song that never fades away,
Playing softly every day.
